meta_data.description: 2483 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Apartment / Flat in Jaypee Greens Star Court, Jaypee Greens, Greater Noida * 21 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 15th floor (out of 19). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Situated in jaypee greens greater noida, jaypee greens star court is a well planned, ready to move society that offers a pleasant living experience to its residents. This is a 3 bhk apartment now available for rent. This property is close to metro station, close to school, close to hospital and close to mall. This flat consists of 4 bathrooms & 1 balcony in 1750 sq.Ft. Carpet area. This property is constructed on 2200 sq.Ft. Extra space for servant room. You also get 1 covered parking inside the premises located on 8th of 19 floor. This is a ready to move property and it is 5-10 years old flat. It is a semi-Furnished property. Inclusive of 7 light, 5 fan, 5 ac, 3 geyser, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney and 1 exhaust fan. Ready to occupy from fri, 31 oct 2025, this property is ideal for families, single men and single women on any agreement type with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 11 months. The expected rent is 48,000 monthly. Electricity & water charges are excluded. Security deposit of 96000 is required. Built in features are reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, piped-Gas, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm, high ceiling height, internet/wi-Fi connectivity, water purifier, private garden / terrace, natural light, airy rooms and spacious interiors etc. You will get access to swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, lift(s), maintenance staff, visitor parking, water softening plant, shopping centre and security personnel etc. In this society. Additional features with this property include rain water harvesting, separate entry for servant room, waste disposal, no open drainage around, bank attached property, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat has a north-East orientation. The flat's flooring is wood.
